But then, there's the factor of not knowing who she is. Does she get more than me? Is she even in our study group? The uncertainty is unsettling, but I try to push it aside and focus on my objective. As I consider how much N dollars I can give away, I think about the idea of reciprocity. If I'm willing to part with 10 bucks to get more money out of this arrangement than she would get from our study group, then I have a good chance of making it work.
